TRANSFORMFIELD.EXPRESSION: DECODE( TRUE, ISNULL(lkp_LoanDetails_ID), 'New', lkp_ApprovalDate != ApprovalDate OR lkp_Term != Term OR lkp_LowDoc != LowDoc OR lkp_MIS_Status != MIS_Status, 'Changed', 'No Change' )
TRANSFORMFIELD.NAME: op_flag

GROUP.DESCRIPTION: Path for the data when none of the group conditions are satisfied.
GROUP.NAME: DEFAULT1
